entries.name: new(request, option={})
entries.desc: Create a new CGI::Session object for request.

entries.name: [](key)
entries.desc: Retrieve the session data for key key.

entries.name: []=(key, val)
entries.desc: Set the session data for key key.

entries.name: close()
entries.desc: Store session data on the server and close the session storage. For some session storage types, this is a no-op.

entries.name: delete()
entries.desc: Delete the session from storage.  Also closes the storage.

entries.name: update()
entries.desc: Store session data on the server.  For some session storage types, this is a no-op.
